alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 01 at 3:10AM MDT until April 02 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches. Locally higher amounts up to 20 inches in the Tetons. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM Saturday to 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, including over Teton and Togwotee passes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
